description:
Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil N 05 Antrasit: The Ultimate Eye Definition Tool

The Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil N 05 Antrasit is a premium eye makeup essential designed to create stunning smokey eye looks with minimal effort. This professional-grade eye pencil delivers intense color payoff with its rich antrasit (anthracite) shade – a sophisticated deep charcoal gray with subtle undertones that flatters all eye colors and skin tones. 💫

Product Information

Size Standard eye pencil size
Color N 05 Antrasit (Deep Charcoal Gray)
Material Velvet-smooth formula
Brand Name Topface

Key Features of the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil

  • Velvety Smooth Texture: Glides effortlessly across the delicate eye area without tugging or pulling
  • Intense Pigmentation: Delivers bold, rich color in a single stroke
  • Blendable Formula: Easy to smudge for creating the perfect smokey effect
  • Long-Lasting Wear: Stays put throughout the day without smudging or fading
  • Versatile Application: Can be used as eyeliner, eyeshadow base, or for creating detailed eye looks

Why Choose the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil N 05 Antrasit?

This smokey eye pencil is the secret weapon in your makeup arsenal for creating everything from subtle daytime definition to dramatic evening looks. The antrasit shade is particularly versatile, offering a softer alternative to harsh black while still providing impactful definition. 👁️

Perfect for makeup enthusiasts of all skill levels, this pencil makes achieving the coveted smokey eye effect accessible even for beginners. The creamy formula allows enough playtime to blend before setting to a smudge-resistant finish that lasts all day.

Looking for more eye makeup options? Check out our complete makeup collection for complementary products to enhance your eye look.

How to Use Your Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil

For a classic smokey eye look, line your upper and lower lash lines with the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil, then use a smudge brush or your fingertip to blend the color outward before it sets. Layer with complementary eyeshadows from our makeup range for added dimension.

For a quick everyday look, simply line your upper lash line and smudge slightly for subtle definition. This versatile pencil can also be used to tightline the upper waterline for an eye-enhancing effect that makes lashes appear fuller.

Explore our international fragrance collection to complete your beauty routine with a signature scent that complements your stunning eye makeup.

Frequently Asked Question: How do I prevent my smokey eye pencil from smudging throughout the day?

To maximize the staying power of your Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil, start with an eyeshadow primer to create a smooth base. After applying and blending the pencil, set it with a matching powder eyeshadow. For extra longevity, especially on oily lids, dust a small amount of translucent setting powder over your completed eye look. 💯

Complete your makeup collection with our premium fragrances and discover why the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil N 05 Antrasit has become a must-have tool for makeup artists and beauty enthusiasts alike.
